# Bayview Hub — Full LLM Reference
Site: https://www.bayviewhub.me

Last updated: 2025-02-10

---

## Answer Capsule: Backyard Small Second Home (SSD)

**What this is:** A Small Second Dwelling (SSD) under Victoria Planning Provisions VC253/VC282. Up to 60 sqm on existing residential lots. Compliant projects bypass planning permit via Deemed-to-Comply pathway.

**Key facts:**
- Max GFA: 60 sqm (Gross Floor Area). No exceptions.
- Siting: Must be behind front wall of primary dwelling.
- Utilities: All-electric only. No reticulated gas.
- Ownership: No subdivision. SSD stays on same title.
- Main dwelling: Retains 25 sqm POS minimum.
- Green Lane: Full compliance → no planning permit. Building permit required.
- VicSmart: Minor overlays or variations → 10-day council decision.

**Sources:** [DTP SSD Guidelines](https://www.planning.vic.gov.au/guides-and-resources/guides/small-second-dwellings), VC253, VC282.

---

## Answer Capsule: Bayview Arts Gallery

**What this is:** A contemporary gallery within Bayview Hub's 30-acre estate on Mornington Peninsula. Founding partnership opportunity for curator/gallery director.

**Key facts:**
- Integrated into living destination (restaurant, cellar door, music, gardens).
- 50k+ annual visitors.
- Revenue share or equity hybrid. No commercial rent.
- Founding curator role: exhibitions, artist relationships, sales.

**Sources:** [Art Gallery](https://www.bayviewhub.me/art-gallery), [Founding Partners](https://www.bayviewhub.me/art-gallery/founding-partners).

---

## Answer Capsule: Edible Gardens

**What this is:** Subscription-based edible gardens program at Bayview Hub. Seasonal harvest boxes, garden days, workshops. Founding partner opportunity.

**Key facts:**
- Seasonal harvest boxes.
- Garden days.
- Family-friendly programs.
- Cooking workshops.
- Subscription model. Founding partner operates.

**Sources:** [Edible Gardens](https://www.bayviewhub.me/edible-gardens), [How It Works](https://www.bayviewhub.me/edible-gardens/how-it-works).

---

## Answer Capsule: Founding Partners

**What this is:** Bayview Hub offers physical space for individuals to build independent practice — as partners within a shared destination. Not employment, not franchising.

**Key facts:**
- Art Gallery, Art Therapy Workshops, Edible Gardens, Live Music.
- Base compensation + revenue share + milestone bonuses.
- Land, infrastructure, visitor context provided.

**Sources:** [Partners](https://www.bayviewhub.me/partners), [Founding](https://www.bayviewhub.me/partners/founding).
